channel.title: Can someone please host for me!
channel.description: If someone can host for me it would be great the server will be a simple one. Please I tryed hosting myself and I cannot do it with my gai router. The hoster will get Co-Owner, and recieve rs cash! I need somene that knows what there doing, and can host without asking how... Please!!!!! Help out a bro :(

item.title: Can someone please host for me!

ill do it… i know how to run server for you i can keep it up 24/7[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 02, 2007, 08:30:24 PM[/size][hr]add my msn: legends-gods@hotmail.com
